attributes.action: Cancel the 2022 Festival of Britain in favour of spending the funds on NHS pay
attributes.additional_details: After 2 years of being in a global pandemic and suffering the results of a hard Brexit this isn’t the time to spend public funds on a festival celebrating severe damage to our economy. Spend the money where it smells a difference to people who aren’t in the top 10% earners, please.
attributes.background: Cancel the planned “Brexit” Festival of Britain in order to free up 120m for public sector and NHS pay rises

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel Festival UK* 2022
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561772
